note.p: Farmer, publican, butcher, and shepherd. Of Wong Farm, Anwick, Lincolnshire, in 1851. Publican and butcher in Peterborough, 1861. Shepherd in Spalding, Lincolnshire, 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/2100/263/8); 1861 (RG9/966/96/31); 1871 (RG10/3318/51/19)
UK and Ireland: Find a grave index, 1300s–current (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 12 September 2019)
